Description: 1980 Japan Ibanez Artist AR50 (Artist Junior) – Super 70 Humbuckers w/OHSC Overall condition of the guitar is Very Good for a 38 year old player Appears to have all of it's original parts and plays/sounds great Guitar weighs 8 lbs. 4 oz. on my digital scaleThe pickups are the Super 70 humbuckers and are very articulate and well balancedThe guitar is in nice shape with a carved mahogany body and neck like a Gibson Les Paul. There is some normal age/wear, … dings/scratches/dents to the body finish and the chrome parts. The finish hastypical dings/nicks etc and a few chips that go through the paint, … normal for a player guitar of this age. Action is low/fast with room to raise/lower to suit your style. Frets are in very good shape, with minimal wear and no fret buzz, … amazing for a 38 year old guitar. What makes this guitar special: A killer sounding Japanese made solid body with a cool vintage vibe. Double cutaway in a slick black finish & loaded with a pair of double cream humbuckers that sound fantastic! Cosmetic Condition: Used, but not abused with typical play wear -various nicks, chips, dents & dings; surface scratches & some buckle rash on the back of the body. Overall the guitar has a great look to it with a nice patina. Neck: Medium profile set neck with rosewood fingerboard& pearloid dot inlays. Frets show some light wear, but have plenty of life in them. Ibanez Smooth Tuner II machines in perfect working condition. 1 11/16" nut width; 24 3/4" scale length. Neck is straight & truss rod works fine. Body: Double-cutaway solid body with arched top. Stop tailpiece & adjustable bridge with brass saddles. Guitar weighs 8 lbs. 4oz. on my digital scale Electronics: Double cream humbuckers with cream bezels. Dual volume & tone controls with gold speed knobs; 3-way toggle switch. All electronics are in good working condition. The buyer pays for shipping and I will only ship to the lower 48 States.Payment is by Paypal and is due within 72 hours of the end of the auction. I will only ship to Paypal verified addresses. No zero or negative feedback bidders. Thanks for looking !
Title: Vintage 1980 Japan Ibanez - Artist AR50 Guitar w/Super 70 Pickups
